text: Ten minutes later he stopped in a lane and helped me out with the same careful courtesy."What sort of boat is it?" I asked."She," he corrected."She's a converted life-boat. Not a very good one, but she's sound enough and the engine's fine.
handwritten_text: Ten minutes later he stopped in a lane and helped me out with the same careful courtesy."What sort of boat is it?" I asked."She," he corrected."She's a converted life-boat. Not a very good one, but she's sound enough and the engine's fine.
